output: Main forms of word "to be": am, is, are
Main forms of word "be": was, were, been
Main forms of word "have": has, had, having
Main forms of word "run": runs, ran, running
Main forms of word "go": goes, went, gone, going
Main forms of word "eat": eats, ate, eaten, eating
Main forms of word "swim": swims, swam, swum, swimming
Main forms of word "write": writes, wrote, written, writing
Main forms of word "fly": flies, flew, flown, flying
Main forms of word "read": reads, read, reading
Main forms of word "speak": speaks, spoke, spoken, speaking
Main forms of word "sing": sings, sang, sung, singing
Main forms of word "catch": catches, caught, catching
